alert.note: Alert for Craighead; Greene; Poinsett (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 7:47AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Greene, western Craighead and northwestern Poinsett Counties through 815 AM CDT... At 747 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Swifton, or 15 miles south of Lake Charles State Park, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jonesboro, Bono, Crowleys Ridge State Park, Lake Frierson State Park, Cash, Egypt, Walcott, Fontaine, Greenfield, Apt, Valley View, Dorothy, Winesburg, Cary, Lanieve, Lorado, Herndon, Pitts, Herman and Dryden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
